hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
export VMNAME="RC-$$" /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init build /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init start /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'wget https://rsyslog.metacentrum.cz/rsyslog3.git/bootstrap.install.sh && sh -x bootstrap.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh phase2.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh metalib/tests/phase2.sh'
/puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh krb5-user.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh krb5/tests/user.sh'
/puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh -x rsyslog-client.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh -x rsyslog/tests/rsyslog_installed.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh -x rsyslog/tests/rsyslog-client_netstat.sh'
